cameraStates.iosVideoTooLarge:
Video cannot be played.
iOS does not support video larger than fullHD (2MP: 1920x1080).
cameraStates.flashRequired:
Video cannot be played.
Please install Adobe Flash for playing video from ARM-based servers.
cameraStates.flashOrWebmRequired:
Video cannot be played.
Please install Adobe Flash orWebM codec for playing video in Internet Explorer.
cameraStates.noArmSupport:
Video cannot be played.
This browser or device does not support video playback from ARM-based servers.
cameraStates.noFormat:
Video cannot be played.
This browser or device does not support video playback from this camera.
cameraStates.ieNoWebm:
Video cannot be played.
Please, install WebM codec for Internet Explorer.
cameraStates.ieWin10:
Video cannot be played.
Please, use Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome browsers.
cameraStates.ubuntuNX:
Video cannot be played.
